tasks.task: Trail clearing and bush hogging using a tractor and bomb of light attachment.
subtasks: Maneuvering the tractor through the Florida scrub.
Utilizing the bomb of light attachment to cut down trees.
Cutting branches hanging over the field to allow efficient tractor movement.
Picking up and moving the cut branches using the tractor.
Operating a chainsaw to cut difficult branches.
Addressing the issue with the tail wheel attachment.
Ensuring safety around the pond and machinery.
Dealing with Florida humidity and heat.
Protecting against mosquito and fly bites.
